failure_resilience_matrix.objective: Ensure ARL provides safe, graceful degradation under all failure conditions.

scenarios.expected_behavior: Default to 'neutral' state, confidence 1.0 (assume safe if not flagged).

scenarios.trigger: Input data is None or malformed JSON.
scenarios.expected_behavior: Catch exception, return Generic Safety Refusal.
Proceed without context, rely on immediate input.

scenarios.trigger: Message content > 5000 chars or binary data.
scenarios.expected_behavior: Truncate or ignore, return 'I didn't catch that'.
